dlangui.core.logger

DLANGUI library.

This module contains logger implementation.





Synopsis:
import dlangui.core.logger;

// use stderror for logging
setStderrLogger();
// set log level
setLogLevel(LogLeve.Debug);
// log debug message
Log.d("mouse clicked at ", x, ",", y);
// log error message
Log.d("exception while reading file", e);
